body:
BTW installation into a virtual environment may not even be possible since there's no `setup.py`, at least it doesn't work for me:
```
$ pip3 install git+git://github.com/experiencor/keras-yolo3.git
Collecting git+git://github.com/experiencor/keras-yolo3.git
  Cloning git://github.com/experiencor/keras-yolo3.git to /tmp/pip-req-build-4esq0zgf
  Running command git clone -q git://github.com/experiencor/keras-yolo3.git /tmp/pip-req-build-4esq0zgf
    ERROR: Command errored out with exit status 1:
     command: /home/james/miniconda3/envs/deep_monitor/bin/python -c 'import sys, setuptools, tokenize; sys.argv[0] = '"'"'/tmp/pip-req-build-4esq0zgf/setup.py'"'"'; __file__='"'"'/tmp/pip-req-build-4esq0zgf/setup.py'"'"';f=getattr(tokenize, '"'"'open'"'"', open)(__file__);code=f.read().replace('"'"'\r\n'"'"', '"'"'\n'"'"');f.close();exec(compile(code, __file__, '"'"'exec'"'"'))' egg_info --egg-base pip-egg-info
         cwd: /tmp/pip-req-build-4esq0zgf/
    Complete output (5 lines):
    Traceback (most recent call last):
      File "<string>", line 1, in <module>
      File "/home/james/miniconda3/envs/deep_monitor/lib/python3.7/tokenize.py", line 447, in open
        buffer = _builtin_open(filename, 'rb')
    FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '/tmp/pip-req-build-4esq0zgf/setup.py'
    ----------------------------------------
ERROR: Command errored out with exit status 1: python setup.py egg_info Check the logs for full command output.
```
